column4: after selecting the recommended option.. it downloads the driver and then typically asks you to reboot.. did you reboot?
yes i did reboot, but it's not giving me the proper resolution option to choose, max 640x480

probably because your monitor isn't sending it's capabilities to the card.  in ubuntu, xrandr can be used to add the resolutions you need to the system so the video driver will see that they are available..
can you send me the private message again? I lost it
